detailsData.title: Personal Attention
detailsData.content: Mitchel S. Drantch answers his phone calls personally, ensuring direct communication with clients. This level of personal attention is rare in the legal community.

detailsData.title: Trial Success
detailsData.content: Mitchel S. Drantch has been very successful at trial, which often leads to fair settlement offers before it becomes necessary to file a lawsuit.

detailsData.title: Focused Practice
detailsData.content: The firm limits its practice to car accident related cases, allowing for a deep understanding and expertise in this specific area of law.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Representation
detailsData.content: Mitchel S. Drantch includes property damage claims representation for his clients at no additional cost, ensuring comprehensive legal support.

address: 7333 West Jefferson Ave, Suite 250, Lakewood, CO 80235
companyName: Law Offices of Mitchel S. Drantch
valueProp: Imagine the worst possible scenario on the road – being hit by a car or hitting someone else. Whether you’re the driver behind the wheel or the pedestrian crossing the street, no matter what you’re driving or the circumstances that led to the accident… Who do you want on your side to ensure you’re taken care of with everything that comes next? When you need to win that case to get your life back on track after an accident, the attorney Coloradoans turn to is Mitchel S. Drantch.
CTA: I Answer my calls personally, call anytime 24/7

testimonalData.text: Mitch took great care of me! I was hit by a truck while riding my bicycle and a seemingly simple case turned into a convoluted mess.
testimonalData.author: A Google User

testimonalData.text: Mitch knows the importance of personal attention when it comes to legal representation. I think that reflected in the outcome of my case.
testimonalData.author: A Google User

testimonalData.text: Mitch is the best. Mitch is smart, personable and professional. Mitch explained things very clearly and understandable.
testimonalData.author: A Google User
